verbs.description: [ARG1: Cohen] [V: is] [ARG2: under scrutiny by federal prosecutors in New York City for his business dealings and a $ 130,000 hush - money payment he gave porn star Stormy Daniels right before the 2016 presidential election] . President Trump later reimbursed him for that payment , which Daniels says was to keep her quiet about an affair she claims to have had with Trump in 2006 .
